sentences.en: Authorities have also recovered a satellite phone that appears to corroborate much of his testimony.
sentences.cn: 当局还找回了一部看起来能证实其大部分证词的卫星电话.
其他地方的试验也证实了这些结果。

sentences.en: Have you got anything to corroborate your video between the coach and the kid?
sentences.cn: 找到加强录像说服力的证据了 吗 ?

sentences.en: If you're going to be my witness, your story must corroborate my story.
sentences.cn: 如果你充当我的人证, 你的陈述一定要证实我说的话.

sentences.en: It appeared that what he said went to corroborate my account.
sentences.cn: 看来他所说的和我叙述的相符.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, five former and two current employees corroborate her description of work conditions at Lion.
sentences.cn: 与此同时, 莱恩的5名前雇员和2名现雇员证实了卡罗尔·谢尔顿对莱恩厂工作条件的描述.

sentences.en: There's nothing to corroborate your story.
sentences.cn: 无任何东西可以确证你的话.

sentences.en: They recognize that more trials will be necessary to corroborate long - term effects.
sentences.cn: 他们承认,还需要更多的试验来证实甲状旁腺切除术的 长期 效应.

sentences.en: True ideas are those that we can assimilate, validate, corroborate, and verify.
sentences.cn: 正确的思想是我们可以吸收 、 验证 、 确证以及校验的.

sentences.en: Upon checking your statement, it has been impossible to corroborate the facts.
sentences.cn: 经审查,你所申诉的事实不能得到证实.

sentences.en: We now have new evidence to corroborate the defendant’s story.
sentences.cn: 我们现在有新的证据来证实被告人的说法。

trans.tran_en: to provide information that supports or helps to prove someone else’s statement, idea etc

trans.tran_cn: 证实，支持（某种说法、信仰、理论等），使（信仰等）坚定，使巩固，使加强
